verbs.description: The owner of a popular Mexico City barbecue joint [V: has] made a special effort to hire deportees and other Mexicans who have spent years in the U.S. , a response to President Trump ’s hard - line immigration policies .

[ARG0: The owner of a popular Mexico City barbecue joint] has [V: made] [ARG1: a special effort to hire deportees and other Mexicans who have spent years in the U.S. , a response to President Trump ’s hard - line immigration policies] .

[ARG0: The owner of a popular Mexico City barbecue joint] has made a special effort to [V: hire] [ARG1: deportees and other Mexicans who have spent years in the U.S. , a response to President Trump ’s hard - line immigration policies] .

The owner of a popular Mexico City barbecue joint has made a special effort to hire deportees and other Mexicans who [V: have] spent years in the U.S. , a response to President Trump ’s hard - line immigration policies .

The owner of a popular Mexico City barbecue joint has made a special effort to hire [ARG0: deportees and other Mexicans] [R-ARG0: who] have [V: spent] [ARG1: years] [ARGM-LOC: in the U.S.] , a response to President Trump ’s hard - line immigration policies .
